price: 47. Ma leh wax dhibaato ah, lagumana sarkhaamo (khamrada Jannada).
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
